Simple Calculator instructions

Simple calculator allows you to add, substract, multiple, and divide.

Click on a number on left column to select it.

Takes any whole or decimal number.

Click on a operator button located in the right column to select the function you wish to use.

  • The (C) button clears the output screen.
  • The left arrow (←) button deletes the last number that was clicked.
  • The plus sign (+) button adds. The minus sign (-) button subtracts.
  • The (X) button multiples.
  • The forward slash (/) button divides.
  • The equal sign (=) button equates.
